events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but want to return it because it doesnâ€™t fit and I would like a full refund.
The case has been identified as a refund request related to order return for incorrect sizing.
Support agent Jenny has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. Let me help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unworn and all tags are intact in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund process and sent you a prepaid return label to your email to ship the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label. I appreciate your help.
Your refund request case is now closed after the label was sent. Please ship the jacket to complete the refund process.
Just following up to confirm you have shipped the jacket and to let you know the refund will be processed once the item is received.
The returned jacket has been received and your refund has been completed successfully. Your case is now closed.
We sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the refund process and support experience.
